entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, who got to his feet trembling after an encounter with Malfoy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who asks him what happened and urges Neville to report Malfoy to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another friend of Harry's who had an encounter with Malfoy outside the library.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a character who bullied Neville and made him feel not brave enough to be in Gryffindor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who encourages Neville to stand up to Malfoy.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who Neville is urged to report Malfoy to.

relationships.description: Harry gave Neville a Chocolate Frog to comfort him after his encounter with Malfoy.
Hermione urged Neville to report Malfoy to Professor McGonagall.
Ron encouraged Neville to stand up to Malfoy.
Malfoy bullied Neville outside the library.
Harry defended Neville by saying he's worth twelve of Malfoy.
